stimulusHtml: Although the Great Altar of Zeus and Athena at Pergamon was created as a religious structure, analysis of its sculptural program within its original context suggests that the structure also served to
choicesHtml: memorialize the victory of the Delian League over Sparta
promote the peace and prosperity enjoyed during the reign of Emperor Augustus
celebrate an important military victory of the Attalid Dynasty
house the remains of King Eumenes II of Pergamon
